org.trianacode.gui.hci.tools

Interface ToolComponentModel

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RegisterableToolComponentModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DaxFileComponentModel, DaxJobComponentModel, HiddenComponentModel, IWIRControlComponentModel, MapLocationComponentModel, ScriptComponentModel, ShiwaConfigComponentModel, TextToolComponentModel, TrianaComponentModel

    public interface ToolComponentModel
    The model for a tool in the tool tree and on the workspace

    • Method Detail

      • getTreeIcon

        javax.swing.Icon getTreeIcon(Tool tool)
        Returns:
        the icon for the specified tool (if null is returned then the default leaf icon is used)

      • getTreeToolTip

        java.lang.String getTreeToolTip(Tool tool,
                              boolean extended)
        Returns:
        the tool tip for the tool when in the tree (if null is returned then the default tool tip is used, return a empty string for no tip)

      • getTreePopup

        javax.swing.JPopupMenu getTreePopup(Tool tool)
        Returns:
        the popup menu the tool when in the tree (if null is returned then the default popup menu is used, return a empty popup menu for no popup)

      • getWorkspaceToolTip

        java.lang.String getWorkspaceToolTip(Task task,
                                   boolean extended)
        Returns:
        the tool tip for the tool when on the workspace (if null is returned then the default tool tip is used, return a empty string for no tip)

      • getWorkspacePopup

        javax.swing.JPopupMenu getWorkspacePopup(Task task)
        Returns:
        the popup menu the tool when in the workspace (if null is returned then the default popup menu is used, return a empty popup menu for no popup)

      • getTaskAction

        javax.swing.Action getTaskAction(Task task)
        Returns:
        the action that is invoked when the task is activated (e.g. double-clicked). If null is returned the default tool action is used.

      • getTaskComponent

        TaskComponent getTaskComponent(Task task)
        Returns:
        the task component used to represent the specified task (if null is returned then the default component is used)

      • isUpdateIcon

        int isUpdateIcon(Task task,
               java.lang.String action)
        Called to determine if an icon for the specified action should be displayed, e.g. ADD_INPUT_NODE_ACTION. Returns whether the icon should be displayed (DISPLAY_ICON), should not be displayed (HIDE_ICON) or the action is unknown and should be deffered to the default handler (UNKNOWN_ACTION). If the default handler does not know the action then the icon is not displayed.
        Parameters:
        action - the update action (e.g. ADD_INPUT_NODE_ACTION as defined in UpdateActionConstants)
        Returns:
        either DISPLAY_ICON, HIDE_ICON or UNKNOWN_ACTION

      • getUpdateAction

        javax.swing.Action getUpdateAction(Task task,
                                 java.lang.String action)
        Called to determine the action that is invoked when an update action is choosen.
        Parameters:
        action - the update action (e.g. ADD_INPUT_NODE_ACTION)
        Returns:
        either the action or null if unknown.
